document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Europe except Great Britain and Scandinavia, Maghreb, Near East, Caucasus, Central Asia, Pakistan .

Host plants. On elm, oriental plane (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Populus
sp. ( Salicaceae ) (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
;
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
;
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
),
Malus
sp. ( Malaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 b
), apple (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Crataegus
sp. ( Malaceae ),
Platanus
sp. ( Platanaceae ) (
Heiss 2002
),
Populus nigra
( Salicaceae ),
Quercus macranthera
( Fagaceae ),
Sorghum halepense
( Poaceae ),
Ulmus minor
( Ulmaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ),
Prunus domestica
( Rosaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
;
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
). Also on Fagaceae , Salicaceae ,
Corylaceae (
Dusoulier & Lupoli 2006
)
, on several Rosaceae ,
Anacardiaceae (Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 )
.
